features: ❤【𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟯 𝗨𝗽𝗴𝗿𝗮𝗱𝗲𝗱 𝗗𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗻 & 𝗨𝗻𝗶𝘀𝗲𝘅 𝗦𝗶𝘇𝗲】--- Milky House 10 Pieces microfiber slippers made of premium chenille and microfiber, strong water absorption and dust removal ability. Built-in elastic band design to make it free size, Upgraded increase the size and deepen, suitable for anyone.

❤【𝗣𝗮𝗰𝗸𝗮𝗴𝗲 𝗜𝗻𝗰𝗹𝘂𝗱𝗲𝘀 & 𝗘𝗮𝘀𝘆 𝗧𝗼 𝗖𝗹𝗲𝗮𝗻】--- Machine washable or hand washable. 5 Pairs of shoe covers with 5 different colors(Blue, Orange, Green, Purple, Pink), easy to separate which color for which job. With our mop shoe slippers, the whole family can clean together, and enjoy doing housework with your kids.

❤【𝗠𝗶𝗹𝗸𝘆 𝗛𝗼𝘂𝘀𝗲 𝗚𝘂𝗮𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗲𝗱 & 𝗡𝗼 𝗠𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝗛𝗮𝘀𝘀𝗹𝗲】--- 𝗜𝗳 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗵𝗮𝘃𝗲 𝗮𝗻𝘆 𝗾𝘂𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 𝗼𝗿 𝗮𝗿𝗲 𝗻𝗼𝘁 𝘀𝗮𝘁𝗶𝘀𝗳𝗶𝗲𝗱, 𝗰𝗮𝗻 𝗰𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗮𝗰𝘁 𝘄𝗲 𝘄𝗶𝗹𝗹 𝗿𝗲𝗽𝗹𝗮𝗰𝗲 𝗼𝗿 𝗿𝗲𝗳𝘂𝗻𝗱 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗻 𝟰𝟱 𝗱𝗮𝘆𝘀. With our shoe covers, No more shoe prints or footprints will be left, dress shoe covers up for your guests and your house will stay neat tidy.

❤【𝗡𝗢 𝗦𝘁𝗼𝗼𝗽𝗶𝗻𝗴 & 𝗘𝗮𝘀𝗶𝗹𝘆 𝗗𝗼 𝗦𝗶𝗹𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗛𝗼𝘂𝘀𝗲𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸】--- Perfect for busy housewives, lazy men, or older, etc. Clean your floor just simply wear this over your foot or shoes and walk around, free your hands for other chores. no more kneeling or stooping and no noise.

❤【𝗪𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗹𝘆 𝗨𝘀𝗲𝗱 & 𝗠𝘂𝗹𝘁𝗶𝗳𝘂𝗻𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝗮𝗹】--- Use our mop shoe cover to easily clean the dust, dirt, pet hair, won't damage the floor. Perfect for cleaning your floor, window, bathroom, office, kitchen. Can also be set in mop as a mop head, used to wipe the floor, wipe glass, wash the car, wash desks, etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Professional Milky House Mop Slipper Shoes ---- Make Cleaning Easier and more fun Color: 1 x Green, 1 x Blue, 1 x Purple, 1 x Orange, 1 x Pink, a total of 5 pairsMulti-function dust mop slipper: specially designed to clean all kinds of various stubborn stains such as oil stain, coffee stain, hair, scraps, provide you with a more efficient cleaning experience.For household cleaning! just wearing these mop slippers makes the whole house beautiful!

With elastic strap to fit most sizes of shoes(8-12)Soft material makes these dust mop slippers shoes fit men and women, adult and kids well. easy to wash - hand washable and machine washable, just simply wash with soapy water then wind dry, totally reusable.Save money and the earth by washing our mop slipper shoe covers Super soft, washable and reusable, high absorbing ability, protect the surface of the floor while wiping.5 Colors- Purple, Green, Pink, Blue, Orange add it to a mopping head of your homewear it with or without shoesused in wiping the family floor, washing cars, washing desks, cleaning window glass Our microfiber mop slipper shoes will not scratch your floors and offer the benefit of gripping the dirt and debris while being gentle on your floors.Suitable for use on wood floors, linoleum floors, tile floors, cement floors, most walls, glass mirrors, and sliding glass doors.

Dual-purpose: Just wearing this floor cleaning slippers makes the whole house beautiful.It can also be set in mop as a mop head, used to wipe the floor, wipe glass, or washing the car, etc.Best performance of absorbing water and dust moping with microfiber.Very convenient for cleaning stairs and corners which vacuum cleaner difficult to reach.Soft and non-slip floor cleaning slippers, giving the best experience in household cleaning. Lint-free and unfading, best for long time use.Free size cleaning Mop Slipper Cover, you can wear it with bare feet or as a shoe cover. Both for men and women, adults and kids.Perfect for dust, dirt, and pet hair, this mop shoes cover is a great time saver.Wearing this mop shoe cover, just sweep and clean the floor while you and your guests walk. Just give every family member their own pair, and the whole house gets done in no time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large strechable size.
reviews.reviewText: I really like these and want to get another pack. Im a housd cleaner and I started with a few sets from walmart. Dont waste your time there, the size runs small at walmart and always know when Im using those because they dont cover the sole of my shoe as these do. This brand is great! Larger size. I have a 9 female shoe and there is more stretch room for a larger foot. I like the color variety because its fun to pair them up after cleaning and I can keep tracknof each pair better.I love the thickness because they dont get wet very fast, they are absorbant and great for a quick spot scrub on the floor if you missed somthing. My clients really like that i wear booties into their home so im not bringing outside dirt in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Footies for the floor
reviews.reviewText: It really adds a bit of extra clean feel to the floor. I love to wear a pair on the soap-mop part of it, then switch out another pair for rinsing off. They wash up really good in the washer too after a good floor cleaning. I would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect mopping slipper
reviews.reviewText: I have small feet so finding something that fits is hard. These fit perfectly over my shoes. These are the best to wear when mopping so you don’t get foot prints on your freshly washed floors. Easy to throw in the washer when done. The multiple pairs makes the deal even better. The colors are fun, comfortable and thick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't fit my feet
reviews.reviewText: These are more of a novelty. Not really made well. I've given several pairs away just because it seems like fun, not a really functional item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They work great and even do well on the grout joints.
reviews.reviewText: They work great and even do well on the grout joints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Great value for the price. I have wood flooring and 2 fur babies plus a teen. I want all the extra easy cleaning help that I can get. I just slip them on top of my house-shoes and I walk around the house while it collects debris and dust. I still have to sweep and mop of course but it’s fun and easy way to clean for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have to wear a structured shoe while indoors. These fit nicely over my size 10 shoes and helps to protect my new Luxury Vinyl Flooring from my rubber soled shoes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Just put it on your soft soled slippers or a pair of sneakers (will fit up to a size 10 or 11 shoe) and skate around your house. Works as a dry mop duster, wet mop, or even polish your wooden floors with a spritz of furniture polish or a bit of floor wax...careful not to slip and fall! You can also put it on your dry Swiffer sweeper and then give them a shake outside and then wash them in the laundry when they get soiled. That way you can cut down on buying all the refills.They're actually quite robust. Even using my weight to hard wipe spills on tile floors with my foot did not break or leave strands of fringes of the fabric on the floor.

Used with my Swiffer and picked up hair and dust well. My cat sheds like crazy! Haven't tried washing it yet, so not sure how it will stand up. Great ECO solution, as I don't like to come use throw away Swiffer type cloths!
I wear these over my flip flops. I change them every day. They wash great. The best part is they cut down on sweeping :)

I'm a professional cleaner and I've purchased these a few times.Pros: Customers love that I always wear them. Great for catching dirt and hair. Good for keeping your feet dry while washing the floors.Cons: Poorly made. Most of the time they are stitched incorrectly at the toe. In the picture you'll notice the inch long mircofibers that should be pointing out are stitched inward. This makes them uncomfortable to wear. They are made small and only fit up to a size 10 women's when you are bare foot. Lastly they don't last. Sometimes they wear out at the bottom but more often they come apart at the elastic band
Love these. Put a new pair on over my socks in the morning and effortless cleaning my hardwood floors all day just by walking around!!
